items.title: Former Tesla HR Staff Say They Were Fired for Investigating Allegations of Racism
items.description: They likened working conditions at a Tesla plant in Fremont, California to the “Jim Crow” South.

items.title: Ford Unveils a $2 Billion Facility and Plans for a $30,000 EV Pickup
items.description: The company is also rethinking the automotive assembly line in a way that CEO Jim Farley referred to as a ‘radical change.’

items.title: Why Many Small-Businesses Owners Fear Even a Short Recession Will Sink Them

items.title: Why Good Leaders Ask Great Questions
items.description: Leaders need to start adopting an attitude of curiosity.

items.title: This Founder Says You Should Discuss Mental Health Issues at Work. Here’s Why You Should Listen
items.description: Discussing personal issues in the office used to be viewed as a cultural no-no. Gen Z thinks that should change.
